MoveReplace: Nidoking :: leer thrash
// Route
// This is a clean route (no items etc) with the usual minimum battles (no optionals), with Squirtle as starter
Route: Red Any% Glitchless - Clean
	S: Early game
		GetP: #squirtle:5
		B: rival1
		D: Do parcel stuff and kill an encounter
		E: Route 1 :: 1:0 3:1 4:0 5:0
			Kill an encounter
		Manip: Route 22 :: 3 :: 15 15 14 15
		B: bug1
	S: Pewter City
		Swap: 0 1
		B: brock :: 0:0 0:1 1:0 1:1
	S: Route 3
		B: bug2
		B: jrtrmshorts
		B: bug3
		B: bug4
	S: Mt. Moon
//		B: nerd1
//		B: lassmoon
//		B: hikermoon
		B: rocketmoon
		B: nerd2
	S: Cerulean City
		B: rival2
	S: Nugget Bridge
		B: bug5
		B: lass1
		B: youngster1
		B: lass2
		B: jrtrm1
		B: rocket1
	S: Route 25
		B: hiker1
			Or the other one
		B: lass3
		B: jrtrm2
		B: lass4
	S: Cerulean City (Gym)
		B: jrtrfmisty
		B: misty
	S: Underground & Route 6
		B: rocketdig
		B: jrtrf1
		B: jrtrm3
	S: SS Anne
		B: rival3
	S: Vermilion Gym
		B: surge
	S: Route 9
		B: jrtrf2
		B: bug6
	S: Rock Tunnel
		B: maniac1
		B: maniac2
		B: jrtrf3
		B: hiker2
		B: jrtrf4
	S: Route 8
		B: gambler1
			Or the other one
	S: Pokemon Tower
		B: rival4
		B: channeler1
		B: channeler2
		B: channeler3
		B: rocket2
		B: rocket3
		B: rocket4
	D: TODO: choose your order here!
	S: Erika
		B: beauty1
			Or the other ones
		B: erika
	S: Silph
		B: rocket5
		B: rival5
		B: rocket6
		B: giovannisilph
	S: Koga
		B: juggler1
		B: juggler2
		B: koga
	S: Cinnabar Mansion
	S: Blaine
		B: blaine
	S: Sabrina
		B: sabrina
	S: Giovanni
		B: cool1

		B: giovanni
	S: Victory Road

	S: E4
